title: Changing a nickname that is already taken
body:
Hi
So i have been wanting to change my nickname for quite some time, but the one i want is already taken and that profile is not in use for like 3 months. I would like to contact riot to ask for support, because the account is not in use (i have been following it trust me, totally not in use) but i am not sure will it work. Give me your guide wise people from the internet

replies.body:
Each account starts with 6 months of inactivity protection when it is created, then gains an additional month of protection for every level after 6. 

So to break this down:

>An account at level 6 or below must be inactive for 6 months or more before it is marked as inactive.

>An account at level 30 must be inactive for 2 years, 6 months or more before it is marked as inactive.

>**Inactive** is defined as a period of time where no games of any type are played on the account.

Check out our [Summoner Name Cleanup FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) for complete details. Let me know if you have any questions.

There is something in place for this. 

An account has to be inactive for a number of months equal to their summoner level, with a minimum of 6 months. Once an account has been inactive long enough, you will be able to take their name, but until then the name is protected.
It's only been three months. Thats not long enough to take the name and count them as inactive. I think it takes 2 or 3 years.
